org.netbeans.spi.palette

Annotation Type PaletteItemRegistration


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
 @Target(value={TYPE,PACKAGE})
public @interface PaletteItemRegistration
    Register a palette item. This annotation may be used at two level:
    • at package level body MUST be set;

      Usage example in a package-info.java file, inspired by Netbeans Code Snippet Module Tutorial.
      @PaletteItemRegistration(paletteid = "HTMLPalette", category = "HTML", itemid = "BR", icon32 = "org/netbeans/modules/newsnippets1/BR32.png", icon16 = "org/netbeans/modules/newsnippets1/BR16.png", body = "<br>", name = "New Line", tooltip = "<br>")
    • at class level on class implementing ActiveEditorDrop.

      @PaletteItemRegistration( paletteid = "HTMLPalette", category = "HTML", itemid = "BR", icon32 = "org/netbeans/modules/newsnippets1/BR32.png", icon16 = "org/netbeans/modules/newsnippets1/BR16.png", body = "&lt;br&gt;", name = "New Line", tooltip = "&lt;br&gt;")
      public class MyPaletteItem implements org.openide.text.ActiveEditorDrop ...
    Since:
    1.40

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String category
      Category for palette item.
      String icon16
      Path to a 16x16 image file for palette item.
      String icon32
      Path to a 32x32 image file for palette item.
      String itemid
      Id for palette item.
      String name
      Display name for palette item.
      String paletteid
      Palette root name.
      String tooltip
      Tooltip text for palette item.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String body
      body of palette item.

    • Element Detail

      • paletteid

        public abstract String paletteid
        Palette root name. This is part of palette location in the netbeans layer:
        paletteid/category/itemid

      • category

        public abstract String category
        Category for palette item. This is part of palette location in the netbeans layer:
        paletteid/category/itemid

      • itemid

        public abstract String itemid
        Id for palette item. This is part of palette location in the netbeans layer:
        paletteid/category/itemid

      • icon16

        public abstract String icon16
        Path to a 16x16 image file for palette item.
        Image must be available in classpath.

      • icon32

        public abstract String icon32
        Path to a 32x32 image file for palette item.
        Image must be available in the classpath

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Display name for palette item.

      • tooltip

        public abstract String tooltip
        Tooltip text for palette item.

      • body

        public abstract String body
        body of palette item.
        Default:
        ""
